title: im so asian
body:
So i went to a chinese new years festival (fairfield)  and came to a stall promoting some club.
I saw a shit ton of these 'maze' pens and people were taking them.

I asked the one of the ladies promoting 'are those for FREE?'
shes like, 'yea, take as many as you want'

so i took like 25 of them and walked away. 


You can't blame me right? 

http://puu.sh/ghCNi/609227ad14.png
